name: Teddy is in another ball pit - LD48
name_original: Teddy is in another ball pit - LD48
description:
Your daughter lost her Teddy somewhere deep in some ball pit. Get her Teddy back!

How to play:

  1. You need a mouse!
  2. You can grab and drag players character by grabbing his hands or foots.
  3. The time moves forward faster by moving the mouse faster while LMB is pressed.
  4. You collect candies, burger, kids and Teddy by touching them with hands.
  5. Get the Teddy!
  6. Press “M” to mute Music
